name: Range Ball
description:
let Me Introduce - Range Ball !A game in which the player needs to break the colored tiles that are coming from above!
But be careful, because the color of the ball and the color of the tiles must match.



The features of Range Ball:
  • Adjust the strength of the ball.
  • Not all tiles are broken at first, attention to color!
  • Super bonuses will make it easier for you!
  • The longer you play, the higher the speed of the tiles!
  • And many other wonderful discoveries are waiting for you in Range Ball!
